scripts.publish_website: npm run build_website && git commit -am 'Rebuild website' && git push git@github.com:CIS700-Procedural-Graphics/cis700-procedural-graphics.github.io.git `git subtree split --prefix website master`:master --force
scripts.publish_project1: git push git@github.com:CIS700-Procedural-Graphics/Project1-Noise.git `git subtree split --prefix hw/noise/base master`:master --force
scripts.publish_project2: git push git@github.com:CIS700-Procedural-Graphics/Project2-Distribution.git `git subtree split --prefix hw/wing/base master`:master --force
scripts.publish_project3: git push git@github.com:CIS700-Procedural-Graphics/Project3-LSystems.git `git subtree split --prefix hw/lsystems/base master`:master --force
scripts.publish_project4: git push git@github.com:CIS700-Procedural-Graphics/Project4-Shape-Grammar.git `git subtree split --prefix hw/shapegrammars/base master`:master --force
scripts.publish_ic_distribution: git push git@github.com:CIS700-Procedural-Graphics/IC-Distribution.git `git subtree split --prefix in_class/christmas_tree/base master`:master --force

website.pre: npm run build_website && git commit -am 'Rebuild website'
